column5: who is fishing in or near the gta today, tomorrow? Im looking for some people to hang out with fish for some trout, have a good time! anyone into making a morning or afternoon out of it? I know my hotspots, IM not looking for advice. just some fishing buddies. Pm me if your game! I live central Toronto near  bayview and eglinton.
check out the hook-ups section of the forum.  found here:  hookups
